DataElement.preferredName: Patient Observation Negation Begin Reason Specify
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the free text field to specify reason or description why closely monitoring a patient's condition but withholding treatment until symptoms appear or change process did not begin.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to reason or description why closely monitoring a patient's condition but withholding treatment until symptoms appear or change process did not begin.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Closely monitoring a patient's condition but withholding treatment until symptoms appear or change.

Concepts.definition: Closely watching a patient's condition but not giving treatment unless there are changes in test results. Active surveillance avoids problems that may be caused by treatments such as radiation or surgery. It is used to find early signs that the condition is getting worse. During active surveillance, patients will be given certain exams and tests done on a regular schedule. It is sometimes used in prostate cancer.

Property.preferredDefinition: Not; used for negation of a word or group of words.:Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense.:Description; a statement that represents something in words.

Concepts.definition: An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
Have a beginning, in a temporal, spatial, or evaluative sense; the point in space or time where something begins.
A written or verbal account, representation, statement, or explanation of something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the free text field to specify a reason or event that caused a patient to be removed from a clinical protocol.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: justification for or explanation of the administration or cessation of therapy.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Specify; be specific about something; define clearly.

Concepts.definition: Be specific about something; define clearly.

DataElement.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form
